answers.answer: Thanks for the suggestion. Some of our trackers already have range lines. The weight tracker has a goal line and the diabetes tracker has a target range as well. Which tracker specifically do you want to add range lines for?Thanks,MedHelp

question: I would find trackers more helpful if I could add range lines to some trackers. These would be horizontal lines on the chart. I could then easily see if I am within (or outside) my nominated targets.
title: Adding  Range Lines
